alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 16 at 9:58PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon and South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley
